channel.title: Need information about the mapwalk procedures
channel.description:
Where can I find extra information on how exactly to use the mapwalk procedures, and a manual for xmapwalk.scar?
I am trying to make a Varrock West Miner+Banker, but dunno which methods are best to use for walking.

item.title: Need information about the mapwalk procedures
item.dc:creator: @hellboy3331 hellboy3331
item.description:
@hellboy3331 wrote:

I’ll look there. Thanks for reply.
All help and extra tutorials are welcome.

Read full topic
item.source: Need information about the mapwalk procedures

item.title: Need information about the mapwalk procedures
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

I suggest getting familiar with RRW ( Radial Road Walk ). There’s a tutorial on it at villu, its stickied in the Tutorial Island section.

Read full topic
